body:
#10931

Note: Currently there is a circular dependency between the container and the app, I have removed this dependency by checking if `Yii::$app` is an instance of `\Yii\base\Application`.
While the practical need for using Yii's DI container without a Yii app might be minimal, it makes testing easier and circular dependencies should be avoided if possible, right?

Hmm, can I mention @yiisoft/core-developers?

The implementation is essentially ready, just need to know if I should fix the test or the container (see @klimov-paul  comments in PR)

issue.title: Implementation for #10908

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
Implementation for #10908
- Implemented DI for callable component configuration.
- Removed dependency on `Yii::$app` from `\Yii\Di\Container`.
